sentences: Marjorie Merryman (born 1951) is an American composer, author, and music educator.
She is a member of the composition faculty at the Manhattan School of Music since 2007, where she also served as Interim President, Provost and Senior Vice President at Manhattan School of Music.
She previously taught at Boston University and Macalester College.
Merryman, Marjorie (1996): The Music Theory Handbook Schirmer; 1st edition 144 pp ISBN 978-0-15-502662-9.
